Description: Retrieves the current weather in a given location
Arguments: [{"name": "location", "type": "string", "description": "City and state. For example: San Francisco, CA"}, {"name": "unit", "type": "string", "description": "Measurement unit for the weather. Options: celsius, fahrenheit"}]
